title: ഒരു തെരുവിന്റെ കഥ | Oru Theruvinte Kadha
description: S. K. Pottakkadu, the writer who won the highest literacy award in India, Jnanpith, tells the true story of ordinary human beings who make their lives in a street of Kozhikkodu, Mithayitheruvu. After the tragic end of the novel also the central character tries to hold himself together and to start a new life. A highly touching story by an elegant author.
author: S.K. Pottekkatt
